content: For fiscal year 2023, we are providing initial guidance for revenue of $7.35 billion to $7.55 billion, representing roughly 1% total growth at the midpoint. We expect to generate free cash flow in the range of $500 million to $530 million representing over 10% growth at the midpoint, compared to our fiscal year '22 cash performance. Our full-year free cash flow of $467 million represents a roughly 10% increase year-over-year and, as Nazzic mentioned, we have good line of sight into continuing this growth in Fiscal Year 2023 and Fiscal Year 2024. We are providing initial fiscal year 2023 guidance for revenue of $7.35 billion to $7.55 billion, adjusted EBITDA margins of approximately 8.9%, adjusted EPS of $6.80 to $7.10, and free cash flow of $500 million to $530 million. Finally, our guidance for fiscal year 2023 free cash flow of $500 million to $530 million represents an over 10% increase at the midpoint versus fiscal year 2022. Your line is open.
